Package org.synyx.messagesource

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageAcceptor
    Interface for instances that are able to accept a List of Messages for a given basename This is used by Importer to import Messages from an MessageProvider to a MessageAcceptor.
    MessageProvider
    Interface for instances that are able to return a Collection basenames that are contained.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InitializableMessageSource
    MessageSource implementation that is able to initialize itself using a MessageProvider.
    Messages
    Wrapper class that holds messages.
